TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Chain extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 代表 憑證的鏈結建置引擎。

span.span: Represents a chain-building engine for certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都有全域錯誤狀態稱為應該用憑證驗證。The object has a global error status called that should be used for certificate validation. 控制憑證驗證的規則很複雜，而且很容易忽略錯誤狀態的一或多個相關的項目時，過度的驗證邏輯。The rules governing certificate validation are complex, and it is easy to oversimplify the validation logic by ignoring the error status of one or more of the elements involved. 全域錯誤狀態會考量每個項目的鏈結中的狀態。The global error status takes into consideration the status of each element in the chain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作介面。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 以目標應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及更新版本、類別未實作介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區，可讓您選取的憑證，，然後將憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊寫入主控台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於您選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool useMachineContext) cil managed

param.name: useMachineContext
param.span: 表示使用電腦內容，而 則表示使用目前的使用者內容。

span.span: to use the machine context; to use the current user context.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定一個值，表示是否應該使用電腦內容。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a value that indicates whether the machine context should be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時不會載入使用者設定檔，因此需要使用電腦內容，可以使用這個建構函式。This constructor can be used when the user profile is not loaded and the machine context needs to be used. 當`useMachineContext`參數設定為`true`，本機內容 （HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE 旗標） 用來建立鏈結。When the `useMachineContext` parameter is set to `true`, the local machine context (HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE flag) is used to create the chain. 如果此參數設定為`false`，會使用目前的使用者內容 （HCCE_CURRENT_USER 旗標）。If the parameter is set to `false`, the current user context (HCCE_CURRENT_USER flag) is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區，可讓您選取的憑證，，然後將憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊寫入主控台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於您選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

span.span: if the X.509 certificate is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，從受信任的簽發者有效的 X.509 憑證僅適用於使用中指定物件。Note that a valid X.509 certificate from a trusted issuer is valid only for the use specified in the object. 符合這些鏈結原則規則的憑證可能仍然是針對與安全性/MIME (SMIME)、 Authenticode、 或安全通訊端層 (SSL) 等功能的特定用法無效。Certificates that meet these chain policy rules might still be invalid for specific uses with such features as Security/MIME (SMIME), Authenticode, or Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). 如進一步處理才能判斷憑證是否適用於特定的原則，衍生自並覆寫方法，使其呼叫基底類別，`Build`方法，然後再會其他處理程序。If further processing is required to determine whether the certificate is valid for a specific policy, derive a class from and override the method so that it calls the base class `Build` method first, and then does the additional processing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區，可讓您選取的憑證，，然後將憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊寫入主控台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於您選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChainElements As X509ChainElementCollection

span.span: Gets a collection of objects.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個物件是表示，在鏈結中，呼叫期間所建立的項目方法。Each object is a representation of an element in the chain that was built during a call to the method. 鏈結元素組成物件結構，以及額外的資訊字串 （只適用於 Windows XP 平台）。A chain element consists of an object, an structure, and an extra information string (available only on Windows XP platforms). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區，可讓您選取的憑證，，然後將憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊寫入主控台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於您選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#4)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ ChainPolicy { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，以在建置 X.509 憑證鏈結時使用。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use when building an X.509 certificate chain.

value.span: 與這個 X.509 鏈結關聯的 物件。

span.span: The object associated with this X.509 chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來設定鏈結原則。Use this property to set chain policy. 例如，您可以指定增強金鑰使用方法 (EKU) 的鏈結時，應驗證，或指定撤銷檢查。For example, you can specify the Enhanced Key Usage (EKU) for which the chain should be validated, or specify revocation checking. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區，可讓您選取的憑證，，然後將憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊寫入主控台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於您選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在查詢 CryptoConfig 檔案中定義的對應之後，建立 物件，並將鏈結對應至該對應。

span.span: Creates an object after querying for the mapping defined in the CryptoConfig file, and maps the chain to that mapping.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個方法會建立 X.509 鏈結。By default, this method will create an X.509 chain. 預設的鏈結建置引擎會覆寫 Machine.config 檔案中時，您也可以使用這個方法。You can also use this method when the default chain-building engine is overridden in the Machine.config file. 請注意，為了相容，任何鏈結引擎必須嘗試接受呼叫，而且系統會傳回預設鏈結引擎的語意。Note that for compatibility, any chain engine must attempt to honor the call and return semantics of the default chain engine.
